description: This file contains the implementation of the NoteRepository class, which interacts with the database using Entity Framework Core to perform CRUD operations on Note entities within the NotesBackend application.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Implementation of INoteRepository using Entity Framework Core for data access.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID and owner ID asynchronously.

methods.name: ListAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of Notes for a specific owner asynchronously.

methods.name: CountAsync
methods.description: Counts the number of Notes for a specific owner asynchronously.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Adds a new Note to the database asynchronously.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing Note in the database.

methods.name: Remove
methods.description: Removes a Note from the database.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Saves all changes made in the context asynchronously.
